A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It isn't five stars but i got to offset all the hate... it's really not a one star movie.  People are just being picky snobs.  With that said\, i wish there was a little more saber action and a little less time with Luke and Rey scenes.  Overall however\, it is an entertaining Star Wars.  Din't like it as much as first episode but that doesn't mean i didn't like this film.  It was just good... which i find kinda okay for a second episode.  I just hope the last episode will take everyone critique and be epic\, but will def. watch it... Star Wars isn't dead... it has a lot of potential and badassness.
